entries.title: Lomi indoor composter review: Is this thing magic?
entries.description: I tried an indoor composter for a month. Here's why it quickly became a regular -- and long-term -- part of my family's routine.

entries.title: Headphones: A beginner's guide to terminology and technology
entries.description: We're going to help you learn all you'll need to know to secure yourself a much better audio experience the next time you go shopping for headphones.

entries.title: I tried Masterclass. Here's why it's worth it
entries.description: MasterClass offers informative and useful talks from well-known figures in a range of fields. An early Black Friday two-for-one offer sweetens the deal.

entries.title: United Airlines wants more of your money and it'll tell you exactly why
entries.description: It's always worth knowing what's in an airline's future plans.

entries.title: Why technology may suck the life out of the World Cup
entries.description: For most of the world, the World Cup is the biggest sporting event ever made. This time, technology will play an even bigger role, and it may not be a good one.

entries.title: 15+ best HP Black Friday 2022 deals: Save today up to $500 on select PCs, monitors, and accessories
entries.description: HP is best known as one of the biggest PC makers out there, but the company also produces great monitors, printers, and accessories. Let's take a look at what deals are available for its products leading up to this year's Black Friday extravaganza.

entries.title: 15+ best Black Friday monitor deals 2022: Save today on 4K displays, gaming, smart monitors, and more
entries.description: Your monitor is the main point of communication between you and your PC, so it's of the utmost importance that you're using a good quality display with a size and spec sheet that suits your needs, regardless of whether you're a straight-laced office worker or a hardcore gamer.
